mapper.select: select count(*) from work_order

SELECT sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m%d')=date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'),1,0)) dayTotal, sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m%d')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y%m%d'),1,0)) lastDayTotal,
(sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m%d')=date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'),1,0)) -sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m%d')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y%m%d'),1,0)) )/sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m%d')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y%m%d'),1,0)) dayVal,
sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m')=date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m'),1,0)) monthTotal, sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%m'),1,0)) lastMonthTotal,
(sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m')=date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y%m'),1,0)) -sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%m'),1,0)) )/sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y%m')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%m'),1,0)) monthVal,
sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y')=date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y'),1,0)) yearTotal, sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),interval 1 year),'%Y'),1,0)) lastYearTotal, ( sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y')=date_format(CURDATE(),'%Y'),1,0)) - sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),interval 1 year),'%Y'),1,0)) )/sum(if(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y')=date_format(date_sub(CURDATE(),interval 1 year),'%Y'),1,0)) yearVal
from work_order a
select * from work_order where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) <= date(created_time) and work_status = 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m') as month, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 1,1,0)) workType1, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 2 ,1,0)) workType2, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 3 ,1,0)) workType3, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 1,1,0)) workStatus1, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 2,1,0)) workStatus2, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 3,1,0)) workStatus3, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 4,1,0)) workStatus4 FROM work_order a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') = #{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m') as month, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%d') as day, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 1,1,0)) workType1, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 2 ,1,0)) workType2, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 3 ,1,0)) workType3, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 1,1,0)) workStatus1, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 2,1,0)) workStatus2, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 3,1,0)) workStatus3, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 4,1,0)) workStatus4 FROM work_order a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') = #{year} and date_format(a.created_time,'%m') = #{month} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m') as month, a.work_status as workStatus, a.work_type as workType, COUNT(*) as total, b.USERNAME as userName FROM work_order a, `user` b WHERE a.deal_id = b.USERID and b.USERID = #{id} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m'),workStatus,workType

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m') as month, a.work_status as workStatus, a.work_type as workType, COUNT(*) as total, b.USERNAME as userName FROM work_order a, `user` b WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') = #{year} or #{year} is null ) and a.deal_id = b.USERID and b.USERID = #{id} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m'),workStatus,workType

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m') as month, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%d') as day, a.work_status as workStatus, COUNT(*) as total, b.USERNAME as userName FROM work_order a,`user` b WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') = #{year} and date_format(a.created_time,'%m') = #{month} and a.deal_id = b.USERID and b.USERID = #{id} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%d'),workStatus

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%m') as month, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%d') as day, WEEKDAY(a.created_time) as weekDay, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 1,1,0)) workType1, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 2 ,1,0)) workType2, SUM(IF(a.work_type = 3 ,1,0)) workType3, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 1,1,0)) workStatus1, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 2,1,0)) workStatus2, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 3,1,0)) workStatus3, SUM(IF(a.work_status = 4,1,0)) workStatus4 from work_order a where yearweek(date_format(a.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = yearweek(date_format(#{week},'%Y-%m-%d'),1) group by DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time,'%d')
select * from work_order where TO_DAYS(created_time) = TO_DAYS(#{day})
select count(*) from work_order where TO_DAYS(created_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
